name: great hall
desc: You are standing in the great hall of Racumens Castle. It is dimly lit with a single lantern on the wall and there is a quiet gnome in the corner of the room sweeping up some trash. You should talk to him.

items.name: lantern
items.desc: You need the lantern to see your way around all the rooms

npc.name: gnome
talk: Hey Traveler, watch your steps. Chaos is abound.
Argh, please don't hurt me. I am just a poor orphan gnome who cleans for copper
Why are you here? be careful of the arrow that flies by day

name: dining chamber
desc: you are north of great_hall. be careful soldier. An orc charges at you. (Here we battle for an item)

items.name: key
items.desc: You need this to open the crypt

name: crypt
desc: Locked room. You need a key to get in. Perhaps you collected one in your deadly defeat of the orc in the dining chamber. Beware of traps.

items.name: confusion potion
items.desc: to be Used to confuse Racumen

items.name: shield potion
items.desc: to be used to shield you from Racumens attack

name: torture chamber
desc: you are in the torture chamber. be careful soldier,danger lurks ahead

items.name: Thunderbolt
items.desc: to be collected only when you beat the event

name: ancient study
desc: Ancient study. Library of all the great books in the world

npc.name: elon
talk: I kinda love Etsy, but don't mind me, you need to kill a warlock
If life is a video game, the graphics are great but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long. This has nothing to do with your quest traveler, i just don't get guests often
